question: Use of Buspirone is -
exp: Ans. is 'a' i. e., Anxiolytico Buspirone is a 5. HT1A agonist useful for the treatment of anxiety, o Unlike benzodiazepines, it is non-sedative anti-anxiety drug. o Due to delay in the onset of its action, it is used for the treatment of chronic anxiety and is ineffective in acute panic attacks. o Buspirone lacks anticonvulsant and muscle relaxant property'.
